channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: These CEO’s reveal their top festive reads for the year
item.description: Whether you're an aspiring entrepreneur, a seasoned C-suite executive or someone simply interested in the craft of leadership, these books are valuabl...

item.title: Tourism has become a dirty word. But 2025 could be the year vacationers stop being the villains, experts predict
item.description: Tourism became a harbinger of problems this year—it was long in the making. 2025 could "mark a new dawn" for the industry.

item.title: An Eight-Day Space Mission Turned Into Six Months. Astronauts Are Built Different.
item.description: Astronauts are made of different stuff from you and me.

item.title: Who Are the Houthis and Why Is the U.S. and Israel Attacking Them?
item.description: The Iranian-backed militia has launched attacks on commercial ships in the Red Sea and against Israel.

item.title: N.F.L. Christmas Games on Netflix Break Streaming Records, With Beyoncé’s Help
item.description: The two games had more than 24 million viewers on average in the United States, Netflix said. Viewership peaked when Beyoncé performed.

item.title: Two Sailors Die in Separate Incidents in Sydney to Hobart Yacht Race
item.description: The men were hit in the head by booms on their yachts in separate episodes, as participants faced challenging weather conditions, the police said.

item.title: The Sidney Awards
item.description: A revelatory portrait, an “American Vulcan,” a sober take on DOGE and more.

item.title: How McDonald’s has kept Europeans hooked by fusing an American fast-food staple with local delicacies
item.description: Given its place in U.S. culture, McDonald’s European success might surprise some. But it's a product of the giant's deliberately curated local menus.

item.title: Manmohan Singh, former Indian prime minister known as ‘Mr Clean,’ dies aged 92
item.description: Born in 1932 in what is now Pakistan, Singh never held elected office before taking the vast nation's top job.

item.title: South Korea’s Acting President Han Duck-Soo Faces Impeachment Vote
item.description: The vote was the second major impeachment in two weeks after President Yoon’s ill-fated martial law bid set off turmoil. The country’s currency has pl...

item.title: Prosecutors in Taiwan Indict Ko Wen-je, Former Presidential Candidate
item.description: The prosecutors asserted that Ko Wen-je, a former mayor, took bribes. He and his supporters have maintained that the charges are a political vendetta.

item.title: South Korea’s Acting President Han Duck-Soo Faces Impeachment Vote
item.description: The vote was the second major impeachment in two weeks after President Yoon’s ill-fated martial law bid set off turmoil. The country’s currency has pl...

item.title: Two Sailors Die in Separate Incidents in Sydney to Hobart Yacht Race
item.description: The men were hit in the head by booms on their yachts in separate episodes, as participants faced challenging weather conditions, the police said.

item.title: Trump is set to hike tariffs. Should Southeast Asia be worried?
item.description: Countries like Vietnam benefited from Trump's trade war. That could put them at risk in the second round.

item.title: Friday Briefing
item.description: A mysterious vessel in Finnish waters.
